project.name: vue-scrolllock
project.name_with_namespace: sv / sv-frontend-library / javascripts / vuejs / plugins / vue-scrolllock

packages.name: @sv/vue-scrolllock
packages.description: vue plugin to create crossbrowser scrolllocks only with javascript
packages.author: f.kretschmer@s-v.de

scripts.prod: nuxt build && nuxt generate && nuxt serve
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:style

dependency.name: vue-scrolllock
dependency.name_with_namespace: sv / sv-frontend-library / javascripts / vuejs / plugins / vue-scrolllock

packages.name: @sv/vue-scrolllock

scripts.prepareBuild: npm run cleanup && npm run render:sprites && npm run copy:all
scripts.build: npm run prepareBuild && npm run build:prod
scripts.watch: npm run prepareBuild && browser-sync dist -w --no-inject-changes --single --port 8000 & NODE_ENV=development rollup -c --watch
scripts.copy:all: npm run copy:html && npm run copy:staticAssets && npm run copy:terms
scripts.copy:terms: cp src/templates/terms.template.html dist/terms.html & cp src/staticsites/*.html dist/ & cp src/staticsites/styles/* dist/css/ & cp src/staticsites/scripts/* dist/js/

scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:style && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.lintfix: prettier --write --list-different . && npm run lint:js -- --fix && npm run lint:style -- --fix

scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:style && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.lintfix: prettier --write --list-different . && npm run lint:js -- --fix && npm run lint:style -- --fix

scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:style && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.lintfix: prettier --write --list-different . && npm run lint:js -- --fix && npm run lint:style -- --fix

scripts.dev: pnpm i && cd app && npx nuxt dev --host
pnpm i && cd app && npx nuxt dev --host

scripts.security-scan:dependencies: trivy fs --exit-code 0 --security-checks vuln --no-progress --skip-dirs src/frontend/node_modules --skip-dirs src/backend/vendor --skip-dirs src/backend/storage --format template --template "@conf/trivy/html.tpl" -o reports/dependencies.html ./src; trivy fs --exit-code 0 --security-checks vuln --no-progress --skip-dirs src/frontend/node_modules --skip-dirs src/backend/vendor --skip-dirs src/backend/storage --format json -o reports/dependencies.json ./src; trivy fs --exit-code 1 --ignore-unfixed --security-checks vuln --severity CRITICAL,HIGH,MEDIUM --no-progress --skip-dirs src/frontend/node_modules --skip-dirs src/backend/vendor --skip-dirs src/backend/storage ./src
scripts.security-scan:configuration: trivy fs --exit-code 0 --security-checks config --no-progress --skip-dirs src/frontend/node_modules --skip-dirs src/backend/vendor --skip-dirs src/backend/storage --format template --template "@conf/trivy/html.tpl" -o reports/configuration.html .; trivy fs --exit-code 0 --security-checks config --no-progress --skip-dirs src/frontend/node_modules --skip-dirs src/backend/vendor --skip-dirs src/backend/storage --format json-o reports/configuration.json .; trivy fs --exit-code 1 --ignore-unfixed --security-checks config --severity CRITICAL,HIGH --no-progress --skip-dirs src/frontend/node_modules --skip-dirs src/backend/vendor --skip-dirs src/backend/storage .
scripts.security-scan:image: trivy image --exit-code 0 --no-progress --format template --template "@conf/trivy/html.tpl" -o ${REPORT_FILENAME}.html ${IMAGE} && trivy image --exit-code 0 --no-progress --format json -o ${REPORT_FILENAME}.json ${IMAGE} && trivy image --exit-code 1 --ignore-unfixed --severity CRITICAL --no-progress ${IMAGE}
scripts.security-scan:images: EXIT_STATUS=0 IMAGE=${CI_REGISTRY_IMAGE}/cli:${VERSION:-$(npm run version:current --silent)} REPORT_FILENAME=reports/image-cli npm run security-scan:image || EXIT_STATUS=$?; IMAGE=${CI_REGISTRY_IMAGE}/cms:${VERSION:-$(npm run version:current --silent)} REPORT_FILENAME=reports/image-cms npm run security-scan:image || EXIT_STATUS=$?; IMAGE=${CI_REGISTRY_IMAGE}/node:${VERSION:-$(npm run version:current --silent)} REPORT_FILENAME=reports/image-node npm run security-scan:image || EXIT_STATUS=$?; exit $EXIT_STATUS

scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:js:fix && npm run lint:style:fix

scripts.security-scan:images: EXIT_STATUS=0 IMAGE=${CI_REGISTRY_IMAGE}/cli:${VERSION:-$(npm run version:current --silent)} REPORT_FILENAME=reports/image-cli npm run security-scan:image || EXIT_STATUS=$?; IMAGE=${CI_REGISTRY_IMAGE}/cms:${VERSION:-$(npm run version:current --silent)} REPORT_FILENAME=reports/image-cms npm run security-scan:image || EXIT_STATUS=$?; IMAGE=${CI_REGISTRY_IMAGE}/node:${VERSION:-$(npm run version:current --silent)} REPORT_FILENAME=reports/image-node npm run security-scan:image || EXIT_STATUS=$?; exit $EXIT_STATUS
